channel.title: Video game music mash-up [Collab]
channel.description: So I was recently working on a little remix of the original Donkey Kong when I had and idea. Maybe this could be a fun little collab where... 1. You must create a melody in an any bar loop from a somewhat recognizable game 2. It must be made with stress and copy and pasted to the other stress to pitch shift an octave below or above 3. Must add a drum track using dollar (1 additional drum kit allowed per person for adding on stuff) 4. You may have noticed that I added some sound effects using the other stresses in my part, you don’t have to do that, but it would be appreciated. 5. The intro to the part can’t be longer than 4 bars, and the part itself can’t be longer than 16 bars. And that’s it! In this thread, ask to join (if you want to) and that’s it, though thoughts on games melodies would be appreciated. Thanks! Here is the project: https://app.auxy.co/projects/fNRhzUnfHukSysFt-5qrlg==

item.title: Video game music mash-up [Collab]
item.dc:creator: Indigoo
item.description:
So I was recently working on a little remix of the original Donkey Kong when I had and idea. Maybe this could be a fun little collab where…

  1. You must create a melody in an any bar loop from a somewhat recognizable game
  2. It must be made with stress and copy and pasted to the other stress to pitch shift an octave below or above
  3. Must add a drum track using dollar (1 additional drum kit allowed per person for adding on stuff)
  4. You may have noticed that I added some sound effects using the other stresses in my part, you don’t have to do that, but it would be appreciated.
  5. The intro to the part can’t be longer than 4 bars, and the part itself can’t be longer than 16 bars.
    And that’s it!
    In this thread, ask to join (if you want to) and that’s it, though thoughts on games melodies would be appreciated.
    Thanks!
    Here is the project:
    https://app.auxy.co/projects/fNRhzUnfHukSysFt-5qrlg==

Read full topic
